snippet.title: The Sims 2 - Castaway Stories Official Trailer
snippet.description:
(Nintendo Wii/DS, Windows 2000/98/XP, and PlayStation 2)

Explore a variety of new environments; beaches, caves, lagoons, jungle, plains and volcanic mountains. Create a new life from scratch. Develop tools, build shelter, craft furniture, create clothing, and make art and entertainment. Gather fish, trap animals, raise plants, collect shells, scavenge and decode treasure maps. Build a life comfort on the isalnd or find a way to escape back to civilization.
